level.text: This chapter shall apply to the following types of new products sold, offered for sale, or installed in the District of Columbia:
Single-voltage external AC to DC power supplies;
Any other products designated by the Mayor in accordance with ยง 8-1771.04.
This chapter shall not apply to:
New products manufactured in the District of Columbia and sold outside the District of Columbia;
New products manufactured outside the District of Columbia and sold at wholesale inside the District for final retail sale and installation outside the District of Columbia;
Products installed in mobile manufactured homes at the time of construction; or
Products designed expressly for installation and use in recreational vehicles.
